homePageText.listItem3: A few steps to the beach

review1.author: Kasia Cz.
review1.text: Apartments Crusoe are fabulous, with stylish decor in historic building and same time modern with free Wi-Fi, very comfortable bed and yummy breakfast,right in the very heart of Krakow close to all attractions !!!

review2.author: K.J. Galov
review2.text: I stayed here with my husband and we had a ton of fun. The apartment was clean and roomy. Great location, easy to get to Krakow's biggest attractions. We would definitely stay here again!!!

review3.author: Maggie
review3.text: Walking distance to everything! New renovated, comfy bed and in the bedroom historic brick wall. Such a great atmosphere there! This is Kraków feeling pure! If you need anything extra ask the owner! Rental car? Tips for best restaurants? He can do magic!

invitationTxt.description: Your dream vacation spot! In an apartment in picturesque Primošten! Located in one of the most beautiful seaside towns in Croatia. It offers a unique stay experience, combined with stunning sea views and surrounding landscapes.

headerTxt.header: Luxury apartments in the heart of Primosten

sloganCrusoe.title: Magnificence
sloganCrusoe.description: The world with CRUSOE. The greatest luxury is travelling and staying happy.

togetherPage.description: The apartment is conveniently located near numerous attractions in Primošten. You can enjoy walks through the charming old part of the town, discover local restaurants and bars, and take advantage of beautiful beaches, which are just a few steps away from the apartment.

apartmentCard.title: Crusoe Primošten
apartmentCard.titlePS: Thoughtfully designed, full of style and comfort. With stunning views of the Adriatic.
apartmentCard.feature1: Located in the picturesque town of Primošten.
apartmentCard.feature2: Elegant apartment with a cozy lounge area and dining space.
apartmentCard.feature4: Luxury bathroom for relaxation after a day full of attractions.
apartmentCard.feature6: Terrace overlooking the azure waters of the Adriatic.
apartmentCard.feature7: Perfect location close to Primošten's attractions and beaches.
